title: Everglades National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar              Ranger-led programs are offered year round. Use the calendar below to find information about the park's ranger-led programs, events and more! The spring schedule of events is posted in mid-March; the summer schedule in early June; and the fall schedule in early September.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 7 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Everglades National Park Everglades Exploration      Time: 2:30 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Shark Valley Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Monday Weekly & Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly  from 04/24/2016 to 09/30/2016 The Everglades story is a complex tale of plants, animals, water, and history. Join us for a short talk and get an in-depth glimpse of the Everglades. View Details      Everglades National Park Glades Biking in the Morn'      Time: 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Shark Valley Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Explore the subtleties of the wetlands as the morning light wakes up its inhabitants. View Details      Everglades National Park Ranger Walk      Time: 9:15 AM to 10:00 AM Location: Shark Valley Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Monday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 04/24/2016 to 09/30/2016 Join a Park Ranger or a volunteer for a stroll along the Shark Valley Canal. View Details      Everglades National Park Shark Valley Tram Tours      Time: 9:30 AM to 11:30 AM,11:00 AM to 1:00 PM,2:00 PM to 4:00 PM,4:00 PM to 6:00 PM Location: Shark Valley Fees: Adults $24, Seniors $19, Children $12.75     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 04/24/2016 to 09/30/2016 Two hour tram tour of the Shark Valley area. View Details      Everglades National Park Welcome to Our Home      Time: 2:30 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Shark Valley Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 04/30/2016 to 09/24/2016 The Everglades is home to hundreds of species of wildlife. View Details      Everglades National Park Wild Walk in the Wilderness!      Time: 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Shark Valley Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Want to try something different? How about a wet walk "off-road"? Reservations required! View Details      Everglades National Park Canal Biking      Time: 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM Location: Shark Valley Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Join a ranger for a bike ride down the L-67 canal, the former eastern boundary of Everglades National Park.
